data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the Neotropical Myrmicinae ant genus Blepharidatta Wheeler

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Brandão, Carlos Roberto F., Feitosa, Rodrigo M., Diniz, Jorge L. M. (2015): Taxonomic revision of the Neotropical Myrmicinae ant genus Blepharidatta Wheeler. Zootaxa 4012 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4012.1.2
